title: Account transfer
body: The original date was some time in November, so i'm just wondering when it will be back up given that its already December now

replies.body: Sorry for the delays, transfers are still down due to technical issues.  :(  Our devs are on the case, and updates will be provided [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update).  Hang tight!
Some people including me has waited so long and i would be happy if we would get a discount for transfering, but riot is all about moneyr or isnt it
